name: World War Next
description:
World War Next is a low poly multiplayer FPS set during a World War 3 conflict. Team up in squads to battle it out on real-world locations like Odesa Port. Maps aim to focus on the Eastern European, Middle East and Pacific Theaters.



Choose from over 25 countries from the Allies and Axis including China, North Korea, South Korea, Ukraine, Poland, United States, Russia, Belarus, Japan, Taiwan, Germany, France, Canada, United States, United Kingdom, Iran, Israel, Finland, Sweden, South Africa and more.



World War Next features a vast amount of vehicles like tanks, helicopters, boats and armored cars help players get around quickly.
